Parameters.Name: PerPage
Parameters.Description: Number of records to show per page.  (Max: 10,000, 1,000 or less is recommended). Note there is no warning if there were more pages available. Set higher if you need to return more data.

Parameters.Name: MaxPages
Parameters.Description: When per-page is set max-pages limits the total number of pages requested. Note there is no warning if there were more pages available. Set higher if you need to return more data.
